a: Use the S and D keys to move left and right, and the W key to jump.
b: When pressed against a wall, pressing the W key will let you climb.
c: It was mid May of 1940 when it happened. When the Germans began their invasion of France, but instead of invading directly they used a terrifying new tactic against your country called the ‘Blitzkrieg’.
d: The Germans had completely overrun and captured Belgium and the Netherlands in a record time of just over two weeks. And now they are entering France, heading straight for the capital.
e: Separated from your troop, you are a lone French soldier who used to be stationed on the French / Belgian border. Until the swaths of German tanks and infantry came straight for you. It was a hopeless fight.
f: Already thousands have died in the Blitz, but now that the Germans have invited themselves into the land of their enemies, who knows how many more will die in the weeks to come. The British Expeditionary has already begun to evacuate France in the face of this massive threat, and with the majority of the French Army stationed on the Maginot Line, there is no one to stop them.
